entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 9:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
